# Generated by Pod::WikiDoc version 0.18

=pod

=head1 NAME

CPAN::Reporter::Smoker - Turnkey CPAN Testers smoking

=head1 VERSION

This documentation describes version 0.01_01.

=head1 SYNOPSIS

     $ perl -MCPAN::Reporter::Smoker -e start

=head1 DESCRIPTION

Rudimentary smoke tester for CPAN Testers, building upon L<CPAN::Reporter>.

Under development.

=head1 USAGE

Things to talk about:

=over

=item *

using a minicpan -- need for 01modules.index.html

=item *

skipfile

=back

=head2 FUNCTIONS

=head2 C<<< start() >>>

Starts smoke testing using defaults already in CPAN::Config and 
CPAN::Reporter's .cpanreporter directory.

=head1 BUGS

Please report any bugs or feature using the CPAN Request Tracker.  
Bugs can be submitted through the web interface at 
L<http://rt.cpan.org/Dist/Display.html?Queue=CPAN-Reporter-Smoker>

When submitting a bug or request, please include a test-file or a patch to an
existing test-file that illustrates the bug or desired feature.

=head1 SEE ALSO

=over

=item *

L<CPAN::Reporter>

=item *

L<CPAN::Testers>

=back
